attributes.additional_details:
Headline from a british newspaper:

£70m of British aid 'paid to the Taliban': Cash wasted on bribes and protection money, say campaigners.

Does ANYBODY need any more to convince them that David Cameron is off his head and mentally fundamentally flawed (just like was proven about Gordon Brown over treatment of employees when he was in office) AND totally at odds with all right thinking taxpayers and voters of this country over this topic?
